title: Hurry - the best AirPods Black Friday deal is live at Walmart and going fast
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Get the Apple AirPods 2 on sale for a record-low price of $89
article: The best Black Friday AirPods deal just dropped at Walmart's early sale, and it's somehow still in stock. Apple's AirPods with wired charging case are on sale for a record-low price of $89 (was $199). That's $40 less than the previous all-time low and one of the best Black Friday deals we've spotted so far. Black Friday AirPods deals are always a hot seller and last year's deal at Walmart sold out within hours. This is the lowest price we've ever seen for the AirPods and an incredible deal to pick up before the official Black Friday sale even begins.

The 2019 AirPods include Apple's powerful H1 chip, resulting in faster pairing and seamless connectivity. The H1 chip also allows you to use your voice to ask Siri questions. You can adjust the volume, skip songs, and make calls completely hands-free. The earbuds also come with a wireless charging case that offers 24 hours of battery overall, with 5 hours of battery life (three hours of talk time) on a single charge.
You can also look forward to upcoming bargains at the 2021 Apple AirPods Black Friday deals event and more Apple Black Friday deals.

headers.1: Today's best Black Friday AirPods deal
